Mastering CSS

I like creating things and have always enjoyed drawing, painting and math. I even wanted to be an architect once upon a time! Needless to say, I enjoy playing around with CSS almost too much. Check out some flex vs grid studies I have done, artwork and little animated features I use in different webs!

Some of the pages within this portfolio are styled with Bootstrap, some with Tailwind.

This pre-footer as well as the footer are display flex with some global padding as well as padding for each div.
